messages.message: FYI @avi - we should also explore this while building AI hub apps with various prompts

If we do anything to support structured outputs then think next level. E.g. don’t return the JSON inline, return it as an attachment.

And if we structure the information then why not make it possible to generate a chart, e.g. a bar chart showing income vs expenses. Or a chart comparing each of the docs uploaded, e.g. a financial analysis between companies and show how they relate. Enterprise use case likely won’t need that, but for professional that would be very helpful
